30 October 2009

The First Resurrection of Revelation 20

by Aaron Lord

Kim Riddlebarger takes a crack at the meaning of the First Resurrection in Revelation 20, and also discusses the “already and not yet” aspect of our “already raised” status in Christ. Sounds familiar. ;-) “The Age of the Holy Spirit” (mp3)

I know some of you will appreciate this.

tags: amillennialism - eschatology
